assignments.description: In order to know if this item is a bundle
assignments.name: Assign_Bundle_Items_Quantity
assignments.label: Assign Bundle Items Quantity

assignments.description: Assign the optional SKU from the loop to the Optional SKUs collection
assignments.name: Assign_Optional_SKU
assignments.label: Assign Optional SKU

assignments.name: Assign_QuoteLine_to_List_bundle_item
assignments.label: Assign QuoteLine to List Bundle Item

collectionProcessors.description: Filter bundle items from optional SKUs to create quote lines for the bundle items
collectionProcessors.name: Filter_bundle_items
collectionProcessors.label: Filter bundle items

decisions.description: If there is a parent Id, we are searching Netsuite to get the Items and quantities. If there is no parent Id, we are trying to search the product by name and quantity will be 1.
decisions.name: Has_Parent_Id
decisions.label: Has Parent Id

formulas.description: Return the code without MNT if maintenance and empty for invalid code
formulas.name: CurrentMainProductBaseCode

formulas.description: If the bundle items quantity is more than 0 it means is a bundle
formulas.name: IsBundle

formulas.description: Main Item Quantity after checking against min e max quantity in the product
formulas.name: MainItemFinalQuantity

formulas.description: Main Item quantity from the Main Subscription Item or 1 if main subscription item is not set
formulas.name: MainItemQuantity

loops.description: Loop the bundle items to create quote lines
loops.name: Loop_Bundle_Items
loops.label: Loop Bundle Items

loops.description: Loop product options to build Optional SKUs collection
loops.name: Loop_Product_Options_1
loops.label: Loop Product Options

loops.description: Loop all subscription items returned to find the main item and assign variables to search.
loops.name: Loop_Subscription_Items
loops.label: Loop Subscription Items

recordCreates.description: Need to create one by one here to be used the id to create the bundle items
recordCreates.name: Create_Quote_Line
recordCreates.label: Create Quote Line

recordLookups.description: Get the items from the bundles that are below the main bundle
recordLookups.name: Get_Items_From_Optional_SKUs
recordLookups.label: Get Items From Optional SKUs

fields.name: FinishText
fields.fieldText: The quote {!Get_New_Quote.Name} is generated!

fields.name: Primary
fields.helpText: Select this checkbox to designate this quote as the primary one on the opportunity and sync quote line items with opportunity line items.

fields.name: Start_Date
fields.helpText: Start date for subscriptions in this quote

value.stringValue: Select the product for the quote

variables.description: Keep the optional SKUs from the main bundle. This is to be used to query the for items that are under these optional SKUs. The use case for this is when we have bundles that are automatically added to the main bundle and we also need to insert the bundle items.
variables.name: Optional_SKUs
